New Records: Tyrese Haliburton tallied 25 points, 10 assists, three steals, and two rebounds; Pascal Siakam added 25 points and nine rebounds; Pat Spencer set a career-high with 18 points; Quinten Post made his first career three-pointer
Key Match Events: The Warriors were shorthanded without Steph Curry, Andrew Wiggins, and Draymond Green; The Pacers won the game with a final score of 108-96
Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors were on a four-game road swing and had a back-to-back after a previous win against the Detroit Pistons
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors will get the weekend off before traveling north for a contest with the Toronto Raptors on Monday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a four-game road swing for the Warriors; Rookie Quinten Post made an appearance and scored six points in seven minutes
